name: BruhBuster
description:
Just a Basic Simple BlockBuster game with Bruh Sound Effect

*DO NOT PLAY ON FIREFOX BROWSER*

On Android:

Press the Red Ball to spawn the ball and Touch on either side of screen to move

On Computers:

Press Space bar to Spawn ball and use 'A' and 'D' keys to move.

To run the game Simply click on it.

Godot Engine Project File
